title: Best of The Program | Guest: Salena Zito | 11/9/20
description:
The media projected Joe Biden will be the next president, and Pfizer announced a possible COVID-19 vaccine. Oddly, the mainstream media has gotten real silent on the coronavirus. Glenn argues that Fox News has officially burned itself to the ground. The network didn’t air Judge Jeanine Pirro’s latest show, and she claims it was because she defended President Trump’s search for election fraud. Reporter Salena Zito reviews Pennsylvania’s election results and argues that Americans rejected progressivism at the polls. The Left misjudged the American people yet again. Black Lives Matter groups aren’t so on board with Biden’s message of unity.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
